definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: "I worry that I'm going to have to repeat fifth grade," says Amina.
An unrepeatable read and phantom read can occur.
sentences.chinese: 会发生不可重读和幻像读。

sentences.english: Reread the letters, with your hand cupped over your ear.
sentences.chinese: 重读我的信件，用手在耳边窝成杯状。

sentences.english: Omission of a final or initial sound in pronunciation.
Read or re-read THE ELEMENTS OF STYLE by Strunk & White.
sentences.chinese: 阅读或重读斯特朗克与怀特的《文体要素》一书。

sentences.english: Take apple to reread the former feeling letters, to remember the old sweet memories.
sentences.chinese: 花苹重读昔日的情信，回想旧日甜蜜回忆。

sentences.english: Rereading it has no intention of the love letters, long time gradually old youth.
sentences.chinese: 无意重读那年的情书，时光悠悠青春渐老。

sentences.english: It can even go so far as to help you decode it when revisiting a program.
sentences.chinese: 它同样可以帮助你在重读程序的时候方便解码。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, this caused the document to be written to disk and re-read.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，这会将文档写入磁盘并重读它。

sentences.english: After he re-read the love letter between the lines, he realized that he was dumped by his sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 重读情书之后，他终于明白他已经被情人抛弃了。

sentences.english: Read over them and question them, challenge them.
sentences.chinese: 重读一遍再问问和挑战它们。

sentences.english: Read the passage again. Put a line under the words a and the.
sentences.chinese: 重读课文，划出不定冠词和定冠词。

sentences.english: Go reread that chapter if you're not sure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你还不能确认的话，建议重读一遍那章书。

definition: to read again/to review (a lesson etc)
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
to read (honorific: e.g. your distinguished article)
